Hello there, I am Adam, an upcoming Software Engineer from Toronto, Canada.


A recent graduate from Centennial College. 2+ years experience in Software development. I am into discovering and learning Frameworks and development environments. Interested in devising a better problemâ€‘solving method for challenging tasks and learning new technologies and tools if the need arises.

I have also dabbled in Web technologies like Angular, Express, Node, React, and Remix and built some projects using them, including this website.
